question:
Consider the following reports:
  1. World Investment Report
  2. Global Economic Prospects
  3. Forest Carbon Partnership Facility (FCPF)
Which of the above is/are published by the World Bank?
explanation: World Investment Report is published by the United Nations Conference on Trade and Development (UNCTAD).  Global Economic Prospects is a World Bank Group Flagship Report. Forest Carbon Partnership Facility (FCPF) report is published by the World Bank.
